Getting Started With the Ogury Android SDK¶

Step 1 - Basic Integration¶

To begin monetizing your android application with the Ogury SDK, follow the Quick start Integration guide.
You can also check plugins integrations on the Plugins page if needed.

Step 2 - Monetize Integration¶

Once the basic sdk integration is done, you can choose which ad units you want to implement in order to display ads on your app :
- Optin Video
- Interstitials

If you want to integrate Ogury ads through a mediation, you can follow the Mediations page.
